title: What if i have
body: What if i have only one champion and i reroll 3 skins? And keep doing it will i get all thr skins for that champion?

replies.body: Rerolling 3 skin shards will try and prioritize a skin that you already own if you have a healthy pool of champions.  Healthy pool meaning similar to mystery gifts, where you have at least 10 champions to work with.  Because your pool is so small, you are likely to receive a random skin for a champion that you don't own.  More information on crafting can also be found on our[ hextech crafting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide) guide.  I'm curious to find out what you get!
